flawed_nl_solution:
Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=1>>1 inches per year.
To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
It will take her a total of 24 / 1 = <<24/1=24.03>>24.03 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 24.03 = <<12+24.03=36.03>>36.03 years old when she achieves the world record.
